Name: Omega Mouse
About the game: Omega Mouse is a tactical-action style game of cat and mouse. Know when to retreat and when to attack. Climb the leaderboard rankings by competing for the highest enemy kill counts. Key Features: -Relentless Enemy AI -Friendly NPC helpers at your command -Non-Linear Arena style action -Unique, no-grind leveling system -Compete online for the highest kill counts -Switch between range and melee combat -Top Down, Twin Stick style control scheme Season 1 of Omega Mouse comes with 6 arena maps. Complete the kill count quota to unlock the final boss. Each season comes with 6 new arenas, new enemy types and a unique end-game boss fight. Omega Mouse is a 1 time purchase - all future seasons are included for free!
